# `bbva-button-default`

## `using text property`

##   `Semantic Dom Diff`

####     `DOM - Structure test`

```html
<bbva-button-default
  aria-disabled="false"
  role="button"
  tabindex="0"
  text="Primary"
>
  <button
    aria-hidden="true"
    style="display: none;"
    tabindex="-1"
    type="button"
  >
  </button>
</bbva-button-default>

```

####     `Shadow DOM - Structure test`

```html
<span>
  Primary
</span>

```

## `Using content`

##   `Semantic Dom Diff`

####     `DOM - Structure test`

```html
<bbva-button-default
  aria-disabled="false"
  role="button"
  tabindex="0"
>
  Primary
  <button
    aria-hidden="true"
    style="display: none;"
    tabindex="-1"
    type="button"
  >
  </button>
</bbva-button-default>

```

####     `Shadow DOM - Structure test`

```html
<slot>
</slot>

```
